name: Sherlock Holmes: Lost Detective
description:
** TWO FULL SEASONS NOW AVAILABLE! **

In your role as a rookie agent of Scotland Yard, follow an intricate murder case that will take you to a key witness in a hospital: a professor of English literature who claims to be none other than the famous Sherlock Holmes.

In Season 2, The Runaway Bride, help the Prince find his fiancée who mysteriously disappeared. Will you be smart enough to resolve the case and find the missing princess? What's the plan of a strange group called "The League"?

◆ Use your detective skills to find HIDDEN OBJECTS
◆ Decipher PUZZLES
◆ Gather CLUES
◆ EXPLORE locations
◆ Enjoy a THRILLING ADVENTURE
